numlitem.para: Approach minimums do not require its use, and
Remaining Go-Around switch is verified to be operative.

placard.para: Placard G/A Switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Verify that the operative G/A Switch commands both the A/P and Autothrottle go around mode by performing MCDP ground test #13 (SW G/A). Reference FIM 22-00-03/113.
